about_the_game: Relive your adventure in Azoria with Fae Farm's original soundtrack! The Fae Farm Official Soundtrack features 37 of the original tracks from the game and 5 bonus tracks from the "Skies of Azoria" add-on. Discover over an hour of the orchestral themes composed by Cris Velasco for your epic journey through the magical and vibrant world of Azoria, an Island full of wondrous biomes, endearing characters and fantastic creatures.
detailed_description: Relive your adventure in Azoria with Fae Farm's original soundtrack! The Fae Farm Official Soundtrack features 37 of the original tracks from the game and 5 bonus tracks from the "Skies of Azoria" add-on. Discover over an hour of the orchestral themes composed by Cris Velasco for your epic journey through the magical and vibrant world of Azoria, an Island full of wondrous biomes, endearing characters and fantastic creatures.

name: Fae Farm - Official Soundtrack
short_description: Relive your adventure in Azoria with Fae Farm's Official Soundtrack, featuring 37 of the original tracks from the game and 5 bonus tracks from the "Skies of Azoria" add-on. Discover over an hour of the orchestral themes composed by Cris Velasco for your epic journey through Azoria.
